categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode II — Attack of the Clones

nodes.text: Star Wars: Episode II — Attack of the Clones 3

Star Wars: Episode II — Attack of the Clones was the third issue in the Star Wars: Episode II — Attack of the Clones series of comics. It was released May 1, 2002. It tells the approximate third half-hour of the film, beginning with Anakin Skywalker and Padmé Amidala visiting Watto's junkshop and ending with their capture on Geonosis.

Dark Horse Comics proudly continues the comics adaptation of the long-awaited second Episode of the Star Wars saga. Adapted for comics by Henry Gilroy from an original screenplay by George Lucas and Jonathan Hales, this series tells of a young Jedi coming of age, forbidden love, and a threat that has been a decade in the planning...
Artfully illustrated by Jan Duursema and Ray Kryssing, this four-issue series is a must for the serious Star Wars collector.
The representative of the commerce guilds here is the Sy Myrthian Toonbuck Toora, though the Gossam Shu Mai heads the Commerce Guild in the film.
